text: Nail in the Boot () is a 1931 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Kalatozov.Гвоздь в сапогеГВОЗДЬ В САПОГЕКолония певчих дроздов It stars Aleksandre Jaliashvili, Siko Palavandishvili, and Akaki Khorava. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1931 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Kalatozov
title: Nail in the Boot
